channel.title: Slow-fermented overnight bread, designed for busy people on Sourdough for Busy People
channel.description: Recent content in Slow-fermented overnight bread, designed for busy people on Sourdough for Busy People

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to Sourdough for Busy People! This blog was created to share simple, time-efficient methods for making delicious sourdough bread that fits into your busy lifestyle.

item.title: Recipes
item.description: Browse our collection of tried-and-tested sourdough recipes, all designed to work with our time-saving method.

item.title: The Method
item.description: Our method focuses on minimal hands-on time while maximizing flavor development through long, cold fermentation. Perfect for those who want great bread without spending all day in the kitchen.
